description:
Heroes from worlds of Tezuka Production and Tatsunoko Production "evolved" for their TV appearance.
Source: crunchyroll
Note: The "slow-life anime" is part of the datsuryoku-kei (ennui-style) genre of comedy that depicts the listless minutiae of everyday life. The original anime combined motion-captured improvised acting with computer animation into a series of comedy shorts.

REGULAR.description:
Astro puts a huge hole in the wall. Dronjo goes to Yatterman for bike repairs. Black Jack goes to Dr. Boyacky with the flu. The dumbass couple goes to Guam.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Bob teaches John how to cozy up with a girl at karaoke. Triton of the Sea ruins a live shopping show. Boyacky`s guest, Tink, describes the first time he had fruit punch. The dumbass couple arrives at the Guam airport.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Jetto gets a girlfriend. Luna-chan isn’t happy with Casshern’s parents. Kohta and Shota are in for a surprise on Valentine’s Day. The dumbass couple can’t open the door.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Illana wants Joey to bring a ton of oxygen for a Loose Socks concert. Mr. Mustachio and Dr. Elefun are getting old. Tink thinks Princess Sapphire`s hoarse voice sounds pretty badass. 38-year-old Manabu-kun can hardly find himself, much less a marriage partner.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Casshern and Braiking Boss have a score to settle in the sauna. Jetto needs clothing advice. Anchorman Masu gets help with his articulation. The thirty-eight-year-old Jennys groupie is looking for a husband.

REGULAR.description:
Triton hits the treadmill; the treadmill hits back. The Ambassador of Magma becomes the Representative of Bling. News anchor Oguma gets a taste of Boyacky Therapy. The cabbage farmer is hunting for a wife who can work a pickup truck.
